original: My friend, gold is the sign of nobility!
translation: 我的朋友，黄金就是高贵的象征！

original: It is time to abandon this land and move on to greener pastures.
translation: 是时候放弃这块土地，迁徙到更加肥沃的牧场了。

original: Abandon the county and let one of the neighbors grab it
translation: 放弃这个省份，让一个邻国获得它。

original: The clans can forcefully depose the Khagan and replace him with someone more powerful.
translation: 各部族可以武力废黜可汗并用更有实力的人代替。

original: Does NOT risk a Minor Clan Rising
If we have enough Prestige, we can subdue large foreign areas in a single war.
translation: 如果我们拥有足够威望，就能够在一场战争中征服大片外国土地。

original: The maximum number of Clans is determined by the size of the realm. Having too many clans will negatively affect the §YClan Sentiment§! of all vassal clans towards their liege. There is also an absolute maximum of §Y$MAX$§! Clans, at which point you can no longer use the §YSplit Clan§! interaction and any subjugated §YNomad§! will become a §YTribal§! ruler instead.
translation: 最大部族数量由领土大小决定。过多部族会令所有部族对其领主的§Y部族观感§!产生消极影响。部族数量的绝对最大值为§Y$MAX$§!个部族，此时你不能§Y分裂部族§!并且任何被征服的§Y游牧§!会成为§Y部落§!封臣。

original: Have §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! thrown into the deepest hole in the dungeon and forget all about [Root.GetObjectPronoun]. There is no escape from the Oubliette! ([Root.GetPossPronounCap] life expectancy will not be high down there...).
translation: 将§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!扔进地牢内最深的洞穴里，完全忘掉[Root.GetObjectPronoun]。没人能从密牢里逃跑！（[Root.GetPossPronounCap]预期寿命在里面将急剧下降）。

original: Have §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! moved to a secure cell in the dungeon, where [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] can't escape easily, yet with a fair life expectancy.
translation: 把§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!转到地牢的单间里，在那[Root.GetSubjectPronoun]无法轻易逃跑，还能活得久一些。

original: Move §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! to a guarded suite of rooms. There is a higher risk of escape, but [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] will want for nothing and can expect to live for a long time.
translation: 把§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!转移到卫兵把守的套间中。这会提升逃跑的几率，但[Root.GetSubjectPronoun]不会提要求并且可以活得很久。

original: The Khan holds too much land compared to the other Clans. He has to hand out §Y$NUM$§! counties or he might face revolts from the existing Clans, or even see a minor Clan rising up to seize its rightful position among the major Clans...
translation: 可汗拥有土地的远超其他部族。他必须交出§Y$NUM$§!块土地，否则可能面临现有部族的叛乱，甚至面临次级部族起事，以试图获取在主流部族中的正当地位……

original: Revoke the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§! for §R$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige. This will lower §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s opinion of you by §R$OPINION$§!, and other non-Nomad vassals' by §R$OPINION2$§!.
translation: 收回§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§!会消耗 §R$PRESTIGE$§! 威望。这会使§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!对你的好感降低 §R$OPINION$§!，其他非游牧封臣好感降低 §R$OPINION2$§!。

original: Banished characters might escape with their lives, but they are forced to abdicate their titles, and their wealth is confiscated.
translation: 被驱逐出境的角色可以活着离开，但他们将被迫放弃全部头衔，并且财产将被没收。

original: Banishing a vassal ruler for no valid reason is seen as tyrannical, lowering your other vassals' opinion of you by §R$OPINION$§!.
translation: 无理由驱逐封臣的统治者会被视为暴君，其他封臣对你降低§R$OPINION$§!好感。

original: Start a Feud with another Clan, allowing you to declare Dispute wars on them (unless you are the Khagan - you are never allowed to raid or declare wars on subject Clans.)
translation: 若和其他部族有世仇，允许你发动争夺战争（除非你是可汗——你无法对下属部族发动战争或劫掠。）

original: Offer to reconcile and end our feud with the [Recipient.Clan.GetName]. This will cost us §R$COST$§!¤.
translation: 提出和解并结束我们与[Recipient.Clan.GetName]的世仇。这将花费我们 §R$COST$§!¤。

original: Offer to reconcile with the [Recipient.Clan.GetName] by paying them a significant amount of money - blood money...
translation: 提出和解并支付给[Recipient.Clan.GetName]一大笔钱——血腥钱……

original: Absorb the §Y[Recipient.Clan.GetName]§! Clan - useful if you have too many Clans.
translation: 同化§Y[Recipient.Clan.GetName]§!部族——如果你有很多部族的话这会非常有用。

original: Absorbing a Clan is not a popular action, but might be necessary if you have too many Clans.
translation: 同化部族并不是一个受欢迎的行为，但如果你有很多部族，这就很有必要了。

original: Swearing a Blood Oath will make the §Y[Recipient.Clan.GetName]§! Clan a staunch ally for as long as both rulers live. However, you can only have one other Clan as your Blood Brothers.
translation: 血誓可以让§Y[Recipient.Clan.GetName]§!部族成为你坚定的盟友，只要双方统治者仍然在世。但是，你仅能拥有一个其他部族作为你的结拜兄弟……

original: Swearing a Blood Oath will make the other Clan a staunch ally for as long as both rulers live. However, you can only have one other Clan as your Blood Brothers.
translation: 血誓可以让另一部族成为你坚定的盟友，只要双方统治者仍然在世。但是，你仅能拥有一个其他部族作为你的结拜兄弟……

original: You can adopt the faith of the [Root.Clan.GetName] Clan. The [Root.Religion.GetName] religion does have its advantages...
translation: 你可以改换[Root.Clan.GetName]部族的信仰。[Root.Religion.GetName]宗教确有其优点……

original: Laws are changed by expending Prestige, not by votes
translation: 法律是通过花费威望改变的，而非通过投票

original: With $GOV$ Government, it costs $PIETY$ $PIETYNAME$ to change Demesne Laws
translation: 在$GOV$政体下，需要花费$PIETY$$PIETYNAME$来改变直辖领法律

original: With $GOV$ Government, it costs $PIETY$ $PIETYNAME$ to change Crown Laws
translation: 在$GOV$政体下，需要花费$PIETY$$PIETYNAME$来改变王权法

original: With $GOV$ Government, it costs $PRESTIGE$ Prestige to change Demesne Laws
translation: 在$GOV$政体下，需要花费$PRESTIGE$威望来改变直辖领法律

original: With $GOV$ Government, it costs $PRESTIGE$ Prestige to change Crown Laws
translation: 在$GOV$政体下，需要花费$PRESTIGE$威望来改变王权法

original: Split the Clan of my Blood Brother
translation: 分裂我结拜兄弟的部族

original: Other clan vassals will not oppose the absorption of a traitorous clan.
translation: 其他部族封臣不会反对同化叛乱家族。

original: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! is not allowed to move the capital again for $MONTHS$ months.
translation: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§!不允许在$MONTHS$个月内再次移动首都。

original: §Y$VASSAL$§! can currently raise §Y$NUM$§! Troops due to depletion\n
translation: 由于损耗，§Y$VASSAL$§!当前可以召集§Y$NUM$§!军队\n

original: Promote a soldier from the ranks of your army to lead the troops on the battlefield.
translation: 从军队的普通士兵中晋升一名指挥官以指挥战场军队。

original: There is always demand for fast and strong horses on the steppe.
translation: 大草原上一直急需快速且强壮的马匹。

original: The Holy Site of §Y$SITENAME$§! lacks a Temple Holding
\n§YSince you are blood brothers, they cannot refuse.§!
translation: \n§Y因为你是结拜兄弟，他们无法拒绝。§!

original: There must be a war that §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! can be called to
translation: 必须有一场可以召唤§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!来参加的战争

original: \n§Y[GetBestName]§! will not serve you as long as you are rivals.
translation: \n§Y[GetBestName]§!只要和你是仇敌关系就不会替你效命。

original: \n§Y[GetBestName]§! will not serve you while you are fighting [GetPossPronoun] friend, §Y$CHAR$§!.
translation: \n§Y[GetBestName]§!在你和[GetPossPronoun]朋友，$CHAR$§!开战的时候是不会替你效命的。

original: [From.GetDynName] founded a new merchant republic in [From.GetHerHis] domains, leaving nomad life behind.
translation: [From.GetDynName]在[From.GetHerHis]疆域内成立了新的商业共和国，将之前的游牧生活抛诸脑后。

original: I can choose to leave behind my nomad way of life and found a Merchant Republic.
translation: 我可以选择不再以游牧的方式生活，并且成立一个商业共和国

original: §Y$TITLE$§! will no longer be a nomad title.\n
Global Trade Route Wealth for Trade Posts
translation: 对于贸易站的全图贸易路线财富

original: Global Trade Route Income for Trade Posts
translation: 对于贸易站全图贸易路线收入

original: Global Trade Value in Trade Posts
translation: 贸易站内的全图贸易额

original: Does NOT have a County Capital
Any gold that this unit loots will be added to its owner's treasury directly, since it is raiding in its own realm.
translation: 这个部队抢过来的黄金会直接加到所有者的金库里，因为他们是在自己的领地里劫掠。

original: Is NOT busy with Feasting, Hunting, Travel or other Special Activities\n
translation: 没有忙于宴会、狩猎、旅行或其他特殊活动\n

original: I woke this morning feeling much better. It seems that my illness has passed.
translation: 今早醒来我感觉好了很多。似乎我的疾病已经过去了。

original: It is fitting for a strong [Root.Culture.GetName] ruler to have a strong horse. I can go out and choose a personal warhorse from the herd. If I choose to do so, I should also invest in suitably impressive equipment for it.
translation: 一名强壮的[Root.Culture.GetName]统治者要配一匹强壮的战马。我可以从马群里选择一匹私人战马供我使用。如果我要这样做的话，那么我还要花钱去给战马装配相应的马具。

original: This character has chosen a particularly impressive horse as [GetHerHis] personal mount, granting [GetHerHim] additional prestige.
translation: 此角色选择了一匹完美的战马作为[GetHerHis]私人坐骑，这给予[GetHerHim]更多威望。
